name: Hospital Prototype
description:
HOSPITAL PROTOTYPE

Have you ever wanted to go to an abandoned hospital? If you answered yes, this is just the right game for you! 

And even if you answered no,  try it out anyways! Because who doesn't want to shoot zombies?

Shoot endless waves of zombies and try to survive as long as you can.

Credits

Our developers team

Artem Ionov

Rasmus Ingelin

Sirkku Kilpinen
